Pre-Game Insights: Memphis went 27-55 overall with a 9-32 record at home during the 2023-24 season. The Grizzlies averaged 17.4 points off of turnovers, 13.4 second-chance points and 33.0 bench points last season.
Others: Washington finished 15-67 overall last season while going 8-33 on the road. The Wizards averaged 113.7 points per game while allowing opponents to score 123.0 last season.

Injuries: Grizzlies: John Konchar: day to day (quad), Desmond Bane: out (oblique), Luke Kennard: day to day (foot), Vince Williams Jr.: out (leg), Marcus Smart: out (ankle), GG Jackson II: out (foot ), Cam Spencer: out (ankle).
Wizards: Saddiq Bey: out (knee), Malcolm Brogdon: out (thumb), Kyle Kuzma: day to day (groin), Marvin Bagley III: day to day (illness).
